TextView.tools:text: A staking pool is managed by an individual validator. Running a pool allows a validator to attract more stake and thus increate chances of being selected to produce a block. Validators earn a commission from the delegators upon producing a block. Delegating to a staking pool is usually more profitable than passive delegation, but there is also a risk of losing out on rewards if the validator is not running properly. It is therefore a good idea to keep an eye on the validator's performance. You can read more about how to investigate a validator's performance on our documentation website.
